scenarios.description: This is the April 21st run of the Unmitigated model (ie, no social distancing) with length of hospital stay set to 7 days.
This is the April 21st run of the Unmitigated model (ie, no social distancing) with length of hospital stay set to 14 days.
This is the April 21st run of the Pause-Apr30 model (social distancing until April 30th) with length of hospital stay set to 7 days.
This is the April 21th run of the Pause-Apr30 model (social distancing until April 30th) with length of hospital stay set to 14 days.
This is the April 21st run of the Pause-Jun10 model (ie, social distancing for the foreseeable future) with length of hospital stay set to 7 days.
This is the April 21st run of the Pause-Jun10 model (ie, social distancing for the foreseeable future) with length of hospital stay set to 14 days.
